sections.title: A Telecom Titan in Turmoil
bulletPoints: Verizon, a behemoth in the telecom industry, is making headlines with a shocking workforce reduction.
An alarming 15% of its workforce is set to be laid off, marking a significant shift in the company's strategy.

sections.title: Inside Verizon's Restructuring Plan
bulletPoints: The layoffs are just the beginning of a comprehensive restructuring plan aimed at reshaping Verizon's operations.
Insiders and analysts hint at more changes to come, indicating a pivotal moment for the company's future.
The rationale behind the restructuring and its anticipated impact on both the company and its workforce.
